title: Facebook to curb microtargeting in political advertising
text: Firm considering to raise amout of targeted people from 100 to ‘a few thousands’

title: 7 Top Stocks to Buy for 2020
text: With the holiday season under way, it's time to close out some 2019 positions and start moving money into the top stocks to buy for 2020.

title: Facebook agrees to hand over documents in California privacy probe
text: Facebook has agreed to turn over additional documents after the California state attorney general’s office went to court this month to compel the social media firm to comply with requests for information in its privacy investigation.

title: Zuckerberg Must Embrace Governance to Sustain Facebook Stock
text: Facebook is now fighting governments for the right to act with legislative authority in regulating speech and payments.

title: Facebook gets its biggest name yet to compete in the video game streaming wars
text: Facebook just nabbed a major player for its gaming platform as it continues to ramp up efforts to compete in the video game streaming wars.

title: Facebook Hints At Plans To Restrict Controversial Micro-Targeted Political Ads - Report
text: Sources speaking to the Wall Street Journal say Facebook is considering ways to restrict political adverts that use its technology to target narrow slices of voters.

title: Surprised about Mark Zuckerberg's secret meeting with Trump? Don't be
text: The Facebook CEO views all politics as merely instrumental to the fortunes of his company

title: Campaigns Pressure Facebook to Stay Pat on Political Ads
text: When Google said it would limit the ability of political advertisers to target voters, campaigns said they did not want Facebook to follow.
